articles.description: Britain's Jack Draper throws up on court during a dramatic US Open semi-final defeat where world number one Jannik Sinner ultimately proves a step up in class.
articles.title: US Open 2024: Jack Draper sick on court in semi-final defeat by Jannik Sinner in New York

articles.description: Stand-in captain Ollie Pope answers his critics with a sparkling century on a truncated first day of England’s third Test against Sri Lanka at The Kia Oval.
articles.title: England vs Sri Lanka: Ollie Pope answers critics with century

articles.description: Head coach Craig Bellamy says there is much more to come from Wales after an 'outstanding' draw against Turkey in his first game.
articles.title: Craig Bellamy: Much more to come from 'outstanding' Wales

articles.description: Taylor Fritz becomes the first American man in 15 years to reach a Grand Slam singles final as he beats compatriot Frances Tiafoe at the US Open.
articles.title: US Open 2024: Taylor Fritz beats Frances Tiafoe to reach final against Jannik Sinner

articles.description: A round-up of what has happened so far on day nine at the 2024 Paralympics, with Great Britain already winning five gold medals.
articles.title: Paris 2024 Paralympics: Great Britain up to 41 golds

articles.description: Harry Kane says he is carrying the hurt of losing the Euro 2024 final into the start of Lee Carsley's spell as England interim boss - and is motivated more than ever to help them win a major tournament.
articles.title: Harry Kane: England captain motivated more than ever after Euro 2024 pain

articles.description: USA legend Alex Morgan says she has "done her part" in "helping to gain respect for the women's game" following her retirement from football.
articles.title: Alex Morgan says legacy is 'gaining respect for women's football'

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from France vs Italy in the UEFA Nations League
articles.title: France vs Italy: UEFA Nations League - BBC Sport

articles.description: Ben Duckett says rules about bad light protect the players after more than half of the first day of the third Test against Sri Lanka was lost.
articles.title: Ben Duckett: England batsman on risks of bad light in Test cricket

articles.description: Alfie Hewett wins his first Paralympics gold medal, partnering Gordon Reid to victory in the wheelchair tennis men's doubles in Paris.
articles.title: Paralympics 2024 wheelchair tennis: Alfie Hewett and Gordon Reid win men's doubles gold
